name: Dawn of the New Hour - Aurum Demo
name_original: Dawn of the New Hour - Aurum Demo
description:
What would you do if you were allowed to know the secrets of space and time? The Gate has opened, Portums are unlocked, and the way to new lands brought forth.

Every universe in existence is connected in one way or another. Worlds comprised of the past, worlds comprised of the future, worlds comprised of different paths or ideologies...and the connection is only getting stronger. Because of this, the doors are opening for one man, only known as the Hooded Man, to escape his own universe to take power in another.

Together with his companions, a man named Sullivan must find a way to close these connections, the Portums, and find a way to defeat the Hooded Man, all the while visiting the new worlds that have opened up. Try to solve the mystery of why the connections exist in the first place. If he and his team don't go down this path, their universe and countless others might come crashing down completely, right into darkness.

  • A mystery to solve - Each world have friends to make, enemies to defeat, and a connection that ties it all together. Find the connection. Solve the mystery of why.
  • World travel - Worlds filled with different themes, characters, and quests are explored throughout the game. Travel to each one from a mysterious dimension known as the Gateway. Each world is planned to have different tilesets, making it seem like you really are in different worlds.
  • Time passage - Feel the world react naturally against the sands of time as the sun sets and rises in its favor. Not only is the sun and moon affected, but the weather is affected as well, naturally changing itself as it would in the real world.
  • Dungeons - Secret passages, caves, ruins, and more. Explore every nook and cranny and you might find dungeons to explore, loot, and fight your way through to the end. And just when you thought you'd think mysteries stop with the story, pay close attention...even the dungeons have untold stories, just waiting to be unlocked.
  • Variety of adventure - Want to take a break from fighting or story? Don't worry. Fight in Tournaments, cook food, play an Invaders-themed minigame, partake in the Mystery Chest, challenge the Vex Quizzler, and more!
  • Customization - Choose from a large database of accessories, weapons, armors, and outfits as you fight any Nightmare that crosses your path. With skill-adding weapons, state-defying bangles and so much more, you'll find yourself getting in and out of trouble with ease...or you can find yourself being the one dragged across the ground...
  • And More!

Leave some feedback in the comments section so that I can work hard to fix this game up and form it in the way YOU'D like it! Your opinions are important and will be listened to!

Keep in mind, there's also a Wiki page that you can visit to learn more about characters and lore. https://bowtieartistgames.fandom.com
You might even find secrets or easter eggs on the game within that site...take a look around!
